channel.title: bloodline specific theme items?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "bloodline specific theme items?"

item.title: Re: bloodline specific theme items?
item.content:encoded: alright, was looking at the theme guide and saw bloodline related items and wondered if they were any good

item.title: Re: bloodline specific theme items?
item.content:encoded:
They were going to be for the Drift Racing update that never manifested. Mostly due to the arena being the 'proto' Drift Racing and the huge BWAAA fest that erupted over it.

One of these days I'll grind for them, just for curiosity value.

item.title: Re: bloodline specific theme items?
item.content:encoded: nothing at the moment i believe. McM is still implimenting a use for them but has been busy with the recode and other various things for awhile.

item.title: bloodline specific theme items?
item.content:encoded:
What do they do?
Eyedrops, Antibiotics, Manji Headlights, Drunken Pirate Flag, and Red And Black Shades are the items I am talking about.
